body.name: Fort Building Kit with Blanket for Kids 120 Pcs Glow in The Dark Air Forts Builder Construction Toys for 3 4 5 6 7 8 Years Boys Girls DIY Fort Building Tunnel Play Tent Indoor
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 20 hrs 27 mins
FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 20 hrs 27 mins
features: GLOW IN THE DARK CONSTRUCTION FORT BUILDING KIT: Come with 75 glow-in-dark building Sticks (14.96" long), 23 Green Soild Balls and 22 Blue Soild Balls (1.97" diameter), 118"x94.5" dinosaur blankets. Our 120 PIECE magic-making set allows your child to build forts of all shapes and sizes! Note: The forts need to be exposed to sunlight to activate the luminous function in the dark, please expose the building sticks to the sunlight for 15-30 minutes, it will emit light in the dark.

FLEXIBLE STEM FUN FOR BOYS & GIRLS: The kid's ultimate forts builder kits is designed for child aged 3 and up, they can build a cave, play tent, rocket, house, igloo, princess castle, tunnel, just add a bed sheet to create a hideaway.Let your children create their fantasy world and wander in it for hours!

EASY TO BUILD & DURABLE: Made with solid and premium plastic, simply insert and twist the rods into the balls, builder connect in a few seconds and easily disassemble.The pieces will remain securely connected, so you don’t have to worry about structures collapsing. Come with a storage bag, portable for indoor and outdoor activities.

SPARK CREATIVITY AND IMAGINATION: Perfect creative toys for 2-4 or more childrens to play. Kids working together to plan and solve problems, construct different creative structures, Perfect educational toys gifts on birthday, holiday, Christmas, Halloween, new year!

PROMOTES TEAM-BUILDING SKILLS – Working with other kids helps promote teambuilding skills and how to work with others. It can even be something the whole family does together, and can be done indoor or outdoor, making this a great group activity.
Best Top Christmas Gifts for Kids

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 1,477 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fairly easy for my 4yo to assemble. They do bend very easily and are a bit flimsy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Kids love it
reviews.reviewText: My kids are obsessed! The pieces are super easy for them to handle and click together, which is great for my little ones who are always on the lookout for a new adventure. What I love is how sturdy yet safe the pieces are; I don't have to worry about them breaking or causing any boo-boos. Plus, it's been amazing seeing their little imaginations go wild as they come up with all sorts of cool structures. And when playtime's over, everything packs away neatly, which is a huge plus for me. The only heads-up I'd give to other parents is that if your kids are big on building, you might need to grab more than one set to keep up with their grand designs. Overall, this kit's been a fantastic buy for some creative, screen-free playtime!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun for ALL of us
reviews.reviewText: Got it for my 3 boys under the age of 6 for christmas. Big hit! Great buy. It is sturdy enough to endure a 3 and 1 year old racing in and out of it. Not sturdy enough to endure a 5 year old who has autism and wants to pat down the roof 😅 it is fun for my husband and i to figure out what shapes to build to maximize sturdiness and practicality. It is challenging the first few times! But we had enough to build where we could all fit in. The only 2 reasons i give it 4 and not 5 stars is because it really starts hurting the fingers when it is time to squeeze and pull apart the pieces to take down and it would be really clutch if there was a way to make these sticks almost adjustable spring loaded to adjust size. But dont let that prevent you from buying it if you are considering getting this for your child who LOVES fort building, it is definitely worth it. We will be using ours A LOT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Make parents happy!
reviews.reviewText: You should have seen my son-in-law put this up for his children my grandkids LOL! I never saw him so happy he was so excited! I think he was more excited than the kids lol! It made me so happy I was so overjoyed to bring so much happiness to my little family! If there were 10 Stars I would give it 20! It's very easy they can use different plans included in the kit. The little mother was happy my daughter because it didn't have a lot of huge pieces to put away just goes in a small little bag and sits on a shelf. Totally amazing! Best gift ever for everyone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as sturdy as hoped
reviews.reviewText: It’s very fun to put together but easily comes apart even without the weight of a sheet or blanket. I wish the poles were a bit sturdier

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not only does my 3 year old LOVE this, but also myself and husband. The toddler comes up with the design and mom and dad build lol. We work on this for hours. I will say just 1 pack truly is not enough to make something big enough for adults to enjoy as well. We purchased 2 packs and also got 2 extra large flat sheets to make a complete fort/clubhouse. So much fun for the whole family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fun for the imagination
reviews.reviewText: My 2 yr old twin granddaughters love crawling around in it. Their 5 yr old sister built a great fort for them. Just wish it could be a bit sturdier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My kids love it, 6 years and 1.7 years both plays with it. Blanket also very nice and heavy)
